Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide jumper knitted in a soft wool blend containing glittery threads with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ultralight running jacket in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with a hood with a small collar and narrow elastication around the edge. Zip down the front, chest pocket with a concealed zip and long sleeves with ventilating mesh sections under the arms and thumbholes at the cuffs. Back in ventilating mesh, flatlock seams and reflective details. Rounded, slightly longer hem at the back. Unlined. Weight is 226 g in size M.

Trousers in sturdy, heavily draping jersey with a concealed zip in one side. Straight legs with pearly beads down the sides and concealed press-studs which allow them to be opened from the thighs down.
